system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Jt8eL0qM4rN7sO3p]{persuade an NPC} by promising to protect them from harm, roll with BLOOD instead of HEART.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, they see your point and do as you ask. On a 7-9, they counter your offer or demand payment—a Debt, a favor, resources—before agreeing to follow through.

If you cash in a Debt with the NPC before you roll, add +3 to your total (max+4).

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, they see your point and do as you ask.

If you cash in a Debt with the NPC before you roll, add +3 to your total (max+4).
